mapper.insert: insert into sys_dic_column (id, dep_code, table_id, field_id, field_name, field_type, field_length, field_empty, field_default, field_pk, sort, `state`, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldEmpty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldPk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_dic_column set dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_id = #{fieldId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_type = #{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_length = #{fieldLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_empty = #{fieldEmpty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, field_default = #{fieldDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_pk = #{fieldPk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, dep_code, table_id, field_id, field_name, field_type, field_length, field_empty, field_default, field_pk, sort, `state`, remark from sys_dic_column where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, dep_code, table_id, field_id, field_name, field_type, field_length, field_empty, field_default, field_pk, sort, `state`, remark from sys_dic_column
select * from sys_dic_column where table_id=#{tableID} and state>0
